help.goalDescr: The goal of the game is to form words from letters that appear one by one
help.putLetterDescr: To put a letter on the field, just tap on the desired empty cell
help.wordSelectionDescr: A word is formed by letters that are consecutively adjacent horizontally or vertically. Just highlight them letter by letter. As soon as you remove your finger from the screen, the word will be added to the list. Only nouns in the nominative singular are allowed
help.wordSelectionDescr2: You can highlight several words. One letter can be part of several words
help.submitDescr: Click the button to send the selected words. After that, the cells will be cleaned
help.clearDescr: Click the clear button and then any occupied cell to clear it. But be careful, the number of cleanses is limited. As a reward for sending words, you can get additional purifications
help.undoDescr: Press the undo button to undo the last letter setting. But be careful, the number of undos is limited. As a reward for sending words, you can get additional undos
help.gameOverDescr: The game ends when there are no free cells left
